sqlMap.select:
WITH RECURSIVE menu( co_id ,mnu_id ,mnu_nm ,mnu_nm_eng ,mnu_nm_jp ,mnu_lvl ,hrnkmnu_id ,srt_seq ,srn_id ,arg_val ,mark_yn ,use_yn ,mnu_desc ,mp_yn ,regpsn_id ,reg_dtm ,upd_id ,upd_dtm ,LEVEL ,PATH ,CYCLE) AS ( select co_id ,mnu_id ,mnu_nm ,mnu_nm_eng ,mnu_nm_jp ,mnu_lvl ,hrnkmnu_id ,srt_seq ,srn_id ,arg_val ,mark_yn ,use_yn ,mnu_desc ,mp_yn ,regpsn_id ,reg_dtm ,upd_id ,upd_dtm ,0 ,ARRAY[a.srt_seq] ,false from tsys_menus a where co_id = #coId# and mnu_lvl = 1
UNION ALL
select a.co_id ,a.mnu_id ,a.mnu_nm ,a.mnu_nm_eng ,a.mnu_nm_jp ,a.mnu_lvl ,a.hrnkmnu_id ,a.srt_seq ,a.srn_id ,a.arg_val ,a.mark_yn ,a.use_yn ,a.mnu_desc ,a.mp_yn ,a.regpsn_id ,a.reg_dtm ,a.upd_id ,a.upd_dtm ,LEVEL + 1 ,PATH || a.srt_seq ,a.srt_seq = ANY(PATH) from tsys_menus a inner join menu b on a.co_id = b.co_id and a.hrnkmnu_id = b.mnu_id where a.co_id = #coId# ) SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (order by PATH) as rowno ,co_id as coId ,(select co_nm from tsys_company where co_id = menu.co_id) as coNm ,mnu_id as mnuId ,mnu_nm as mnuNm ,mnu_nm_eng as mnuNmUs ,mnu_nm_jp as mnuNmJp ,mnu_lvl as mnuLvl ,hrnkmnu_id as hrnkmnuId ,srt_seq as srtSeq ,srn_id as srnId ,(select srn_nm from tsys_screen where srn_id = menu.srn_id) as srnNm ,(select srn_url from tsys_screen where srn_id = menu.srn_id) as srnUrl ,arg_val as argVal ,mark_yn as markYn ,case use_yn when '1' then '사용' else '미사용' end as useYn ,mnu_desc as mnuDesc ,mp_yn as mpYn ,regpsn_id as regId ,to_char(reg_dtm, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as regDt ,upd_id as updId ,to_char(upd_dtm, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as updDt ,PATH FROM menu ORDER BY PATH
sqlMap.update: update tsys_menus set mnu_id =#mnuId# ,mnu_nm =#mnuNm# ,mnu_nm_eng =#mnuNmUs# ,mnu_nm_jp =#mnuNmJp# ,mnu_lvl =#mnuLvl#::integer ,hrnkmnu_id =#hrnkmnuId# ,srt_seq =#srtSeq#::bigint ,srn_id =#srnId# ,arg_val =#argVal# ,mark_yn =#markYn# ,use_yn =#useYn# ,mnu_desc =#mnuDesc# ,mp_yn =#mpYn# ,upd_id =#sessionUserId# ,upd_dtm =now() where co_id = #coId# and mnu_id = #mnuId#

insert into tsys_menus (co_id ,mnu_id ,mnu_nm ,mnu_lvl ,hrnkmnu_id ,srt_seq ,srn_id ,arg_val ,mark_yn ,use_yn ,mnu_desc ,mp_yn ,regpsn_id ,reg_dtm ,upd_id ,upd_dtm) select #coId# ,concat(#coId#,substring(mnu_id,6,15)) ,mnu_nm ,mnu_lvl ,concat(#coId#,substring(hrnkmnu_id,6,15)) ,srt_seq ,srn_id ,arg_val ,mark_yn ,use_yn ,mnu_desc ,mp_yn ,'SYSTEM' ,now() ,'SYSTEM' ,now() from tsys_menus where co_id = 'A0001'
